channel.title: Pages on Jashua R. White
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Jashua R. White

item.title: Toolkit
item.description: Below is my technology stack of hardware, software, languages, libraries, tools, and various resources that’ve I’ve grown to love and strive to master. Workstations Apple MacBook Pro 13 Retina i5, 8GB RAM, 256 GB Mini ITX Gaming Desktop, 16GB Ram, 256 GB, i3 3.7GHz, RX 470 (Windows 10) Text Editor Atom (Mac/Windows) HTML Style guide: Code Guide by @mdo CSS Preprocessor: Sass Naming Conventions: BEM JavaScript Frontend Frameworks: AngularJS, Backbone.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a developer and designer actively pursuing my passion to provide digital design and development services. When not working, I enjoy hiking, biking, kayaking, film, robotics, and exploring all the amazing shops, food, breweries, music venues and activities Philadelphia has to offer. Currently, I am a full-time Front-End Web Developer for Thomas Jefferson University Hospital – a major medical university and healthcare provider in Philadelphia. Some of my responsibilities include: developing responsive web pages and components with a focus on user experience, designing templates for various departments and campaign sites, maintaining content, troubleshooting bugs, e-mail marketing, and developing for the front-end development side of our CMS, Adobe Experience Manager (AEM).

item.title: Contact
item.description: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Press+Start+2P'); Send Message .formspree-form { position: relative; } .submit-overlay-sending { position:fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.9); display: none; z-index: 1000; } .submit-overlay-sending__loading-icon { position: absolute; top: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); left: 50%; } .submit-overlay-sending__text { position: absolute; top: calc(50% + 115px); transform: translate(-50%, -50%); left: 50%; font-family: 'Press Start 2P', sans-serif; color: #fff; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: .2em; } .submit-overlay-success { position:absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); width: calc(100% - 50px); height: calc(100% - 50px); background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.
